name: Shmup Fox 32
description:
A starfox inspired Schmup taking place in Corneria. Try to get to the end and defeat the final boss!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB/Space Bar - Shoot

RMB/C - Bomb

LShift - Boost

LCtrl - Breaks

Credits: Programming:
